articles.title: Google offers a free Nest Mini to YouTube Premium subscribers - Engadget
articles.description: Google is once again giving away a free smart speaker to YouTube Premium subscribers, though this time around the offer is available to a greater number of people.
articles.content: Google is bringing back its smart speaker giveaway from last year (via Android Police). However, this time around, the company's offer is available to a greater number of people, with a simpler sign-… [+681 chars]

articles.title: HP Reverb G2: 4K VR Headset With Valve Audio/Lenses, Touch-Like Controllers, & IPD Slider For $600 - UploadVR

articles.content:
Join members of the team at Naughty Dog for an in-depth discussion about the world and characters of The Last of Us Part II.
The game launches on June 19, 2020 on PlayStation 4.

articles.content:
Microsoft only began rolling out the Windows 10 May 2020 Update, version 2004, to mainstream users yesterday, but the company is already investigating multiple issues.
